    • register

      public boolean register(String courseName, long studentID) throws SQLException, NonExistingDataException
      registers a student to a given course
      Parameters:
      courseName - the course to be enrolled in
      studentID - the student to be enrolled
      Returns:
      true if the registration was completed successfully or false if the student is already registered to this course or if there are no more available places for this course
      Throws:
      NonExistingDataException - if the given course or student are not in the list
      SQLException

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      opens a connection to a certain database
      Returns:
      the new connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - for database access errors

      public List<Student> retrieveStudentsEnrolledForACourse(String course) throws SQLException
      retrieves all students enrolled to a given course
      Parameters:
      course - the given course
      Returns:
      a new list containing all the enrolled students
      Throws:

      public void deleteCourse(String courseName) throws SQLException
      deletes the course with the given name from the list, as well from the teacher's list of courses and the students' lists of enrolled courses
      Parameters:
      courseName - string, representing the name of the course to be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException
